name: Simulator Game
description:
This game was made in a 5 day period during Unity education at PISMO Novska. It is our first published game!!!

Role-playing from a small village tribe that has 200 people all the way up to a Gigalopolis.

Programmer: Luka Jovanović, Lovro Kovačević

Art: Roko Lovrić

Mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski
